tree.sampler.rollout

Class RolloutPolicy_SingleRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • tree.sampler.rollout.RolloutPolicy
      • tree.sampler.rollout.RolloutPolicy_SingleRandom

  • public class RolloutPolicy_SingleRandom
extends RolloutPolicy
    Most basic rollout policy. Just randomly picks game.actions until failure. This is how Sampler_UCB was hardcoded for most of its life.
    Author:
    matt

    • Method Detail

      • rollout

        public float rollout(Node startNode,
                     GameThreadSafe game)
        Description copied from class: RolloutPolicy
        Do a rollout from a given node. Assumes that the given game is in the state of startNode! Be careful!
        Specified by:
        rollout in class RolloutPolicy
        Parameters:
        startNode - Starting Node to rollout from.
        game - Instance of the game to use. Must already be at the state of startNode.
        Returns:
